mapper.sql: id, msg_type, user_id, msg_title, msg_content, create_time, modify_time
mapper.select: SELECT us.id, us.msg_type, us.user_id, us.msg_title, us.msg_content, us.create_time, us.modify_time, ums.msg_status FROM carexx_user_msg us LEFT JOIN carexx_user_msg_status ums ON ums.msg_id = us.id WHERE us.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ums.msg_status in (1,2) ORDER BY ums.msg_status ASC, us.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO carexx_user_msg ( msg_type, user_id, msg_title, msg_content, create_time ) VALUES ( #{msgType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msgTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now() )
